camera_and_perspective.view_angle: Wide-angle Aerial Drone Shot, 45Â° Bird's eye view, Establishing context shot
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: 24mm Wide-angle lens, Rectilinear projection, High clarity edge-to-edge, Deep depth of field
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Hyperfocal distance, Sharp texture details from foreground roads to background sky

lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Late Blue Hour (Sun is near horizon, light blue sky with few cloud)
lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Diffuse Skylight from grey blue to bright warm gradient, No harsh directional sunlight, Even global illumination, Balanced exposure between sky and ground
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Light blue sky with thin clouds, distant strong haze at horizon, Soft ambient occlusion, No distinct cast shadows, Slate Grey and Blue environment, Muted Cool Tones
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Very soft ambient occlusion, No distinct cast shadows, Diffuse shading under trees and buildings

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Warm Tungsten Office Spill (3000K), High visibility through glass windows, Soft glow emanating from lobbies
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Minimal exterior decorative lighting, Facades reflecting the cool grey sky, Subtle linear accents

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Street markings highly visible, Faint reflection of street lamps on rough asphalt
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Natural ambient lighting (medium light), Dark lush greens absorbing the skylight, No aggressive artificial uplighting

color_and_grading.palette_theme: Slate Grey/Blue environment vs Warm Honey/Amber interiors, Desaturated realism
color_and_grading.temperature: Overall Cool/Neutral bias (6500K Sky) contrasting with localized Warmth (3000K Windows)
color_and_grading.post_processing: Low Contrast Film Look, 'Raw' photography aesthetic, Slight desaturation, High clarity on road textures, Natural white balance

rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic Architectural Visualization, Mood-based Landscape Photography
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Hyper-realistic asphalt textures, Detailed cloud volume

environment_textures.ground_surface: White road markings showing high contrast, Manicured curvy lawns
environment_textures.foliage_style: Dark dense tree canopies, lush green landscaping, soft transitions between grass and pavement
